abstract: The Boss column on Feb. 24, about Dan Schulman, chief executive of Virgin Mobile USA, referred incompletely to his role in the founding of the company. While he was the first chief executive in 2001, work on setting up the company had begun more than a year earlier.

lead_paragraph: The Boss column on Feb. 24, about Dan Schulman, chief executive of Virgin Mobile USA, referred incompletely to his role in the founding of the company. While he was the first chief executive in 2001, work on setting up the company had begun more than a year earlier.
